body:
Hey guys! My first montage video was a huge success, so it was really hard to try and top it, but I think I've managed to create a video that's far better than the old one. If you liked it, subscribing will keep the videos coming. Enjoy :D

http://youtu.be/FHQGO6eCxzc

replies.body: /toggle blood true/on               I think. If not do /toggle, then press TAB and the options will show. Type on in, press TAB again and it should say something like on or true
